hooks.command: [ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "ERROR: Cannot edit on main branch. Create a feature branch first: git checkout -b claude/[feature]-[id]"}' >&2; exit 2; }

if grep -q '@ts-ignore\|@ts-nocheck\|eslint-disable' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>/dev/null; then echo '{"block": true, "message": "ERROR: File contains @ts-ignore, @ts-nocheck, or eslint-disable. These are forbidden."}' >&2; exit 2; fi
npx tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck 2>&1 | head -30 || echo '⚠️ TypeScript errors detected - fix before continuing'
